Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.store.format

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RecordFormat<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord>
    Specifies a particular record format, used to read and write records in a RecordStore from and to a PageCursor.
    RecordFormats
    The record formats that a store version uses.
    RecordFormats.Factory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseOneByteHeaderRecordFormat<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord>
    Implementation of a very common type of format where the first byte, at least one bit in it, say whether or not the record is in use.
    BaseRecordFormat<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord>
    Basic abstract implementation of a RecordFormat implementing most functionality except RecordFormat.read(AbstractBaseRecord, PageCursor, RecordLoad, int, int) and RecordFormat.write(AbstractBaseRecord, PageCursor, int, int).
    BaseRecordFormats
    Base class for simpler implementation of RecordFormats.
    FormatFamily
    Family of the format.
    RecordFormatPropertyConfigurator
    There are couple of configuration options that should be adapted for each particular implementation of record format.
    RecordFormatSelector
    Selects record format that will be used in a database.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RecordStorageCapability
    A collection of high level capabilities a store can have, should not be more granular than necessary for differentiating different version from one another.
    StoreVersion
    All known store formats are collected here.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnsupportedFormatCapabilityException
